p: As shown in Table 7, in the jejunum, piglets born of sows fed the HF diet exhibited greater ( p < 0.05) villus height and crypt depth compared with piglets born of sows fed the CON diet. In the colon, however, piglets born of sows fed the HF diet exhibited deeper ( p < 0.05) crypt depth and a lower ( p < 0.05) ratio of villus height to crypt depth compared with piglets born of sows fed the CON diet. There were no significant effects of dietary treatment on relative organ weights of the small intestine, heart, spleen, pancreas, kidney and liver in piglets (data not shown).
